flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60 people attended the game.
On Wednesday, 60 + 50 = <<60+50=110>>110 people attended the game.
On Friday, 80 + 60 = <<80+60=140>>140 people attended the game.
A total of 80 + 60 + 110 + 140 = <<80+60+110+140=420>>420 people attended the games in a week.
Therefore, 420 - 350 = <<420-350=70>>70 people more attended the games than they had expected.
#### 70

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 390, not 420. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
